website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully crafted double-walled espresso cup that keeps drinks hot or cold.
pros: Stands out for its well insulated glass design that complements the flavor of your espresso
These glasses are condensation-free and perfect for a standard 2-ounce shot
cons: Water can sometimes leak between the glass walls, making the cups appear dirty or stained

customer_reviews.title: Water leaking between walls
customer_reviews.text: I have the same problem as others... after only three times using, one of my cups has a leak that allowed water to get inside and will now be there forever. I didn't put them in the dishwasher, only lightly hand washed them. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks VERY easily... now on my eighth one!
customer_reviews.text: I've broken seven of these shot glasses... and I am done; no more. While I have dropped several (only inches above the kitchen counter), the glass will crack and shatter even with the slightest tap. The "double walled thermal glass" means the glass is thin with a vacuum air mass between the layers... and thus breaks very easily. Why we REALLY need a glass to pull shots I will never understand. I'm looking elsewhere for a far better solution, and I recommend that you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: BAE Productions

customer_reviews.title: The way espresso is meant to be enjoyed .
customer_reviews.text: The DeLonghi double walked cups bring a new level to enjoying espresso . For a serious espresso drinker flavor is only one part . The subtle colors and hues found in a good shot and the creme are important as well . It may sound trival but trust me is not . The double wall design helps to maintain the shot as it's ideal temperature while allowing the cup to be cool to the touch . These cups are very nicely made and are a steal at this price .
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: one of the glasses cracked in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: These seem like nice espresso glasses, but one of them cracked along the rim with less than a week of careful use. It was not dropped, and only hand washed. I don't know if I got a defective one or if they are simply very extremely delicate. The cost of the item is not enough to deal with the hassle of returning, and I could not find a customer service email address for the manufacturer. I do enjoy making my espresso in the glass cups, but I'll probably stick with tougher ceramic cups in the future.
customer_reviews.author: B. thompson

customer_reviews.title: One glass leaked.
customer_reviews.text: It leaked. The glasses are actually very nice and do a good job at keeping their contents warm or cold, unfortunately one of the glasses leaked after the first washing. I couldn't find any cracks and I'm still not sure exactly where it's leaking, but I suspect it's from the small dimple on the bottom of the glass that was there due to the manufacturing process. in any event, there is about a tablespoon of soapy water between the double walls and I will now have to throw the glass away. Perhaps they need better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: XDeus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent,one trick to using these
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent little cups,they are easy to hold and don’t get warm at all.They hold a full size espresso easily and are easy to clean.Now I noticed some reviews stated they ,cracked,broke or let water in between the walls.When using you should make sure the drip hits the side first.This is easy if you are making 2 cups because people will place the cups separate,but if you are making a single it is harder.You should either not drop the spout or better,always use both cups then combine the drink.Letting the drink cool by dropping,and then going down a side wall is better than letting the stream just hit one spot and not cool a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Von Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Hole in bottom stupid design - reduce durability
customer_reviews.text: Hm, overall I'd definitely buy them again (especially since I could not find Kitchables latte glasses) and the double wall design maintains your drink, and hands, temperature. Plus they're not very expensive and look nice. Really my only complaint is the little hole in the bottom. None of mine leaked out of the box but I think they need to determine a better method of sealing it or producing it without a hole. I don't believe Kitchables has a hole and it's kind of ugly. You can see a weird like pyramid at the bottom of your glass and it looks like glue from a hot glue gun basically.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Eich

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: One of the two glasses that I received somehow gets liquid between the 2 layers of glass. There is a pin hole in the bottom of the glass that slowly leaks the liquid/espresso out leaving very annoying little rings wherever I set the glass. It takes a long time to drain the liquid out after washing. The other "better" glass, seems to be sealed correctly and has no leak, but it is not symmetrical and sits crooked. Overall I had to give this product a 2 star because of these defects. Unfortunately I will have to keep shopping for 2 more glasses when my budget allows.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily but functions well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I broke one of the glasses only after a few weeks of use. I didn't drop it, but I kind of slammed it hard against a cloth-covered surface. It definitely didn't feel like it was enough force to shatter any kind of a glass, but these are very small so it's somewhat understandable that they are somewhat fragile. Each glass holds about ~40g of espresso comfortably for me. I'm not able to use this for any type of a milk-added drink as it simply isn't large enough, but this is my go-to glass if I only want a shot of espresso!
customer_reviews.author: Seth K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful double wall cup with significant flaw
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and solid design, but it became useless after a few time usage. I had to throw away one of my shot glasses due to the leakage into the double glass walls. Apparently there was a tiny glass concealed hole where double walls were put together, and after a few gentle washes, it came off and started collecting water inside. There is no way getting every single drop of water inside glass and has become an eye sore and unsanitary cup to use. The other one works just fine. Just be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kim

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and fit into hand nicely...whether you are a man or a woman
customer_reviews.text: We have become addicted to double walled thermal glasses. My husband is a bit of a mixologist and enjoys creating and sipping icy cocktails. We have several sizes and shapes of thermal double walled glasses, and these are his favorite. ( We have never used them for hot drinks, fyi.) The flared shape helps keep your hand from slipping up and they are stackable!
customer_reviews.author: Elizeon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: shipping package was shipped great cups were not broken and the perfect cappuccino cup with my Nespresso DeLonghi espresso machine
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: 🚫🛑❌ Terrible quality control. The 1st order I received, the glasses were different sizes and 1 had a hole in the bottom which let water in on the 1st wash. I requested a return and replacement and the 2nd set has issues as well. Again different size glasses and one of the glasses had a glass bubble on the bottom making the glass wobble. Fortunately (or not) I had not shipped back the 1st set yet so I was able to salvage the order by pairing the 2 non defective glasses. Of course they are different sizes. 🤦🏻‍♀️ I should really just return these and get a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Pours terrible
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something nice looking for our DeLonghi espresso machine and these seemed like they would fit the bill. Maybe if you just drank espresso shots from these glasses they would work really well, but we tend to use the espresso shots in other coffee drinks like lattes and cappuccinos. Unfortunately, these glasses are terrible to pour from and I probably should have gotten something else. Pros: Great looking, good quality, fun to drink from Cons: Messy to pour from
customer_reviews.author: C. Flaten

customer_reviews.title: Common defect ... read reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: Glasses have a small manufacturing hole which is filled with glue. One glass was defective and allowed water to seep in... once water is inside the glass it cannot be removed.
customer_reviews.author: James Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not durable
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look great and keep your espresso hot. I bought these to go alongside my DeLonghi espresso machine and used them for about 5 months until both shattered within a couple weeks of eachother. Unfortunately since these are very light, are made of very thin glass, and hollow on the inside, they fall over from the slightest bump and will shatter from a moderate fall. I will look for a thicker and more sturdy espresso cup.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable glass espresso cups!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these I have bough because I love them so much. At first I had two for my girl and I. Now when our friends come over they want espresso also so I had to buy more. They look amazing next to our other glassware in the cabinet. They also fit perfectly on top of any espresso glass warmer. They are durable and do not break easily! (Yes, I broke one but I had to drop a large pot on it while doing the dishes.) A quality product that is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but hole is stupid
customer_reviews.text: Hole in bottom literally looks like someone squirted into it with a hot glue gun. Not sure about the longevity but not leaking yet and they look very nice. Great to hold your shot. Honestly I'd probably recommend Kitchables though because that hole seems like a bad design. I bought delonghi because they had both espresso cups and latte cups in stock whereas kitchables latte cups have disappeared? Coffee gator espresso cups look sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Eich

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally dropped one of mine and shattered it so I will point out that they are fragile. The glasses I received did not have any of the defects that other reviewers mentioned. The worked great; no heat from the coffee and they looked beautiful on my counter or table. Again, like any glass product, they are fragile. Outside of that, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abdussalaam Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Make your lattes stunning
customer_reviews.text: Makes me realize Starbucks sizes are all wrong. My preferred recipe is a double espresso with steamed milk and a dash of fresh caramel. Look no further if you want an amazing way to enjoy your latte. Note these do not stack well at all so they take up extra cabinet space
customer_reviews.author: Luke20333

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups, slightly large
customer_reviews.text: These are nice espresso glasses the only issue is the double walls makes placement a little trickier than traditional glasses as traditional glasses have less space between the glasses. I often place slightly too far to one side (slightly) which causes the espresso to run down the sides of the glass. I'm right there to move it to catch the espresso so it's not a huge deal for me. I use these with my breville espresso machine. You can also just use one cup to catch a smaller amount.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work well for double shot espresso
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these if you are planning on using them as shot glasses to be receptacles for double espresso straight from your machine. The curved design prevents them from sitting side by side comfortably to gather espresso. Great if you are doing sing shots.
customer_reviews.author: Ballousmom

customer_reviews.title: I like these glasses and place them next to the delonghi ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses and place them next to the delonghi espresso machine. I hand wash as soon as I finish drinking it. They are really stylish and I stopped using regular coffee cups since I got these. I know they are double wall so they keep drinks warm and risk being a bit more fragile than coffee cups. The best I like to see the colours of my espresso or cappuccino and I would probably start drinking tea in these too. It is part of the experience to drink hot drinks in clear cups, Instead of ceramic cups.
customer_reviews.author: Carina C. Schuelke

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are really pretty. Worked really well until I washed them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are really pretty. Worked really well until I washed them and a small hole appeared in the bottom of the glass. It allowed water in between the two layers of glass. There is a small round circle on bottom of each glass and also the cappuccino glassss I orderd. Did not seem to be a problem till I noticed water between the two layers.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine wilson

customer_reviews.title: love these! these are the perfect cups for our ...
customer_reviews.text: love these! these are the perfect cups for our morning espresso. don't get hot to the touch, look great, and are just the right size. and of course, they're glass, so they'll break, but they're certainly not especially fragile; this is our second set, the first purchased years ago, and no chips, cracks or other damage. we'll definitely come back to this brand and style!
customer_reviews.author: luckigrrl

customer_reviews.title: These are great glasses! I use along with a DeLonghi espresso ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses! I use along with a DeLonghi espresso machine. I haven't experienced any of the leaking issues mentioned in other comments. I've been using for four months and the double wall hasn't leaked. We send through the dishwasher, bottom or top rack and no complaints. My only dilemma is that you have to finagle it a bit under the espresso machine to have it brew straight in. I bought the larger size since others had mentioned the smaller ones didn't fit a double shot. Other than that, it's tough and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Eyes That Shine

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought all three sizes and they fit nicely on the cup warmer of my DeLonghi coffee machine. I already have a Christmas gift idea for a friend who said he really like the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: Small but incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...time to review this item. I bought these so I can use them with my new gaggia caressa espresso machine. First impression very light. First I think it's not going to be thick enough to handle heat from the espresso. But as soon as my espresso finish brewing and hold them you can't even feel the heat....in short I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rookie_doll

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, too fragile
customer_reviews.text: Just broke the remaining glass of my second set. As much as I love the way they look and how well they work, I'm not sure I'll buy another set because I know they will eventually get broken. I didn't have any leaking issues noted by others with either set that I owned. They are/were great glasses but despite being aware of their fragility and treating them with kid gloves, they break so easy it's likely to happen to every one.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: I love these glassses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glassses. They are very pretty and keep my coffee warm. I can't give them five stars because I also ordered the latte ones as well and they have leaked water between the two layers of glass. I'm afraid that these will too. There is a small dot of round glass on the bottom of each one and this is what came off on the same brand glass.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. If you are going to drink a good espresso, the glass should also match the quality of what is inside. These are glass, so treat them with care. Espresso drinking is partly a ritual, so have good equipment in your daily ritual. This was a perfect fit for my new Nepresso Breville Mini!
customer_reviews.author: kmrotterdam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and keeps drinks hot
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase to go along with our De'Longhi Specialista espresso machine. They seem like they might be plastic when you tap on them, but they are indeed glass -- we already knocked one onto the floor and it shattered. Just the right size for a double with steamed milk and keeps drinks hot.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Sacrifices sturdiness for thermal insulation
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Works as intended to keep espresso hot for an extended period. - Can catch a double-shot spout with wide lip - Has a nice feel against the mouth Cons - Slippery to hold without a handle. - Thin glass. Extremely light and fragile. With above point, don't see these lasting long. - Lip is so wide that shots run down side if poured out slowly. Makes a bad latte prep glass.
customer_reviews.author: Papa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for, as the name says it, cappuccinos.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make cappuccinos with my Nespresso machine and Aeroccino milk frothing accessory. The 6oz cup size is just the right amount. Sometimes, I might get a bit too much foam that doesn't fit in the cup, but that's going to depend on the kind of milk being used and how much foam is produced by the automatic milk frother. I'm satisfied with the quality of these cups considering I was worried about their durability. So far, I have not had any condensation issues or any leakage of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: jad.yassine1994

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful durable Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love this glass and use it every morning--even for regular coffee. I kept one and gave one to my granddaughter. She makes cappuccino each morning. She said. "Grandma--the glass makes my morning brew look beautiful."
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little espresso glasses. They work wonderfully with our delonghi combination espresso maker. We have been using these everyday for almost a month and no leaking or cracks. I just rinse the glass after right after use so haven't placed in the dishwasher yet. no issues, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Djc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect espresso shot glass
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the shot warm, and allows me to view the quality of the shot. I've read some people complain that water gets into the interior. I have never experienced this. However, if I would, I would get rid of the water as follows: 1) preheat oven to 250 degrees F (remember that water boils at 212 degrees F) 2) place glass inverted (bottom side up) on some wax paper (I suspect you shouldn't put the glass directly on metal) 3) watch as the interior water boils, turns to steam, and leaves your cup et voila!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Boyd

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I thought something was wrong with my espresso machine because one would always fill higher than the other. But upon looking closer its the cups, one actually holds less liquid. Also no matter how quick I try to dump it in my coffee cup, it always leaks down the side and makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, and they work!
customer_reviews.text: These things are mesmerizing... the air space between the double wall glass looks so cool when you fill the glass with coffee. They keep the latte at a perfect temp, and are pleasant to hold and drink out of. I like everything about them. I also have the espresso glasses and the cappuccino glasses, and they too are great to look at and beautifully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jibbonte

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after just 3 gentle uses ... UGH!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase these with an amazon gift card for Christmas. Like another review, after only 3 uses and gentle hand washing,one of them began to leak water into the middle cavity. I am 55 and very particular ... also very careful. I figured the other reviews of this nature were from people who just weren’t very careful. WRONG, these simply do not hold up. Like others have said ... save your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good but defective
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an easy piece of drinkware. Unfortunately both of mine developed pin holes in them after half a dozen uses. Waiting on replacements from amazon. They are fairly light as well. I was expecting a little bit more weight to them as well (like a shot glass weight or so). Overall they work well and look nice. Hoping I just got two with a glass defect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously fragile and crappy.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews seemed great so I was shocked when I opened the package and found glasses felt so light and cheap. One ultimately shattered into a million shards so fine that it created a cloud of glass dust that went EVERYWHERE. Wish I hadn't cheaped out.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these to go with my Espressione EM-1040 coffee/espresso machine because they were listed as other items I might want to have with the coffee machine. While I like the double wall feature, the glasses are too small to hold the liquid of a double shot. I either have to let the extra espresso flow over the glasses and into the overpower reservoir or I have to cycle the glasses emptying them into another cups the brew process goes to completion. If these were just a bit bigger they'd be perfect
customer_reviews.author: The Oracle

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought all three sizes and they fit nicely on the cup warmer of my DeLonghi coffee machine. I already have a Christmas gift idea for a friend who said he really like the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a coffee specialist and he wanted these espresso glasses really badly. They are gorgeous and the coffee tastes great (espressos and macchiatos). They are easy to clean and store. The only bad thing was that one arrived with a little broken line in it... I'm guessing these glasses are very delicate to ship. We kept it since we didn't want to go through the return process.
customer_reviews.author: CGH

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but very fragile
customer_reviews.text: These espresso glasses look nice and work well for holding espresso, but beware that they are very fragile. I tipped one over (didn't even drop) and it shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Water Pools Between Two Walls
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other negative reviews, one of my glasses has water pooling between the two walls. It happened after the very first use, which is super frustrating, given that it was not necessarily an inexpensive product for its size. It is basically unusable because there's dirty water between the walls and some condensation, so I prefer to no longer use it. Unfortunately there is not an easy way to contact the seller and get a replacement. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: MANUFACTURER SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: The shot glass works fine. HOWEVER, one of mine had water sitting between the double wall within one month of use. DeLonghi does not have a return/replace option on Amazon. For broken parts, it refers you to contact the manufacturer. I contacted the manufacturer, and the man on the phone had an attitude with me for no reason. Additionally, they would not replace it. 1 month! So choose carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Cups!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cups, very sturdy (I actually dropped one on the kitchen floor this week and it luckily bounced!), my husband loves to sip his espresso shots from these with a tiny touch of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: K Gunter

customer_reviews.title: They warm nicely on Espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: DeLonghi Double Walled Thermos Express Glasses are the best. I plan on ordering another 6. Just bought the Espresso machine and find I have people coming by regularly for espresso. People want to use my Double Walled Thermos Expresso Glass cups for the coffee shop experience. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Does not fit with DeLonghi espresso maker. Use at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit under DeLonghi espresso machine. I didn’t know there were multiple sizes! It just shows a picture with a set like this and I thought it would work since it doesn’t say anything about fitment or height requirement! Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Cup
customer_reviews.text: I bought the DeLonghi coffee maker, and it was such a quality machine, I decided to stick with the brand because they really do make quality products. These cups are stylish, durable, and work well.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought the DeLonghi coffee maker, and it was such a quality machine, I decided to stick with the brand because they really do make quality products. These cups are stylish, durable, and work well.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Same issue- water
customer_reviews.text: As others have said... I hand washed mine. There is a surprising amount of water between the layers of one of the cups. Purchased in late February and it’s now mid July. I’d say each cup has been used roughly 40 times. That’s not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fraczek

customer_reviews.title: Break way too easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these glasses present the drink and I love how it keeps the drink warm and your fingers from burning without a handle but for the love these things need to be thicker. Just lost another one after a 1 inch fall off of the drain grate to the counter top and it exploded. Looking for a different type of cup now I've lost way too many of these
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot but not your hands
customer_reviews.text: Classy little cups. I love how they look and feel. Perfect addition to my espresso machine. And they are just the right size to sit on top and still be under kitchen cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Destini Jewell

customer_reviews.title: These are some very attractive glasses. However if you’re ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some very attractive glasses. However if you’re using them to pour shots into another receptacle, the espresso will tend to flow down the outside wall of the glass rather than out towards your pour. I guess these glasses are made for looks and sipping, not pouring.
customer_reviews.author: The Saddest Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great little espresso glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great little espresso glasses, have a nice sturdy feel to them and I liked the glass design so you can see the shot pour in :). Nothing else to say other than these are glasses and they hold a shot each, so it's perfect for any espresso maker.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Long

customer_reviews.title: Thin, one already broke
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, bubble imperfection on the bottom of both glasses. One already broke and sounded like an egg shell when it hit the counter. I’m just thankful it cracked and wasn’t a full break with thin glass everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Loftin

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Simply Espresso Cup
customer_reviews.text: Clean, simple and functional espresso cup. I was looking for something simple to use to make coffee drinks, but also to use to drink plain espresso - these were the perfect solution. Really great and functional. So far - no complaints on durability. I am careful with the cups, but did drop 1 in the sink and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly I

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glassware for Delonghi esspresso maker!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for lattes. Double wall glasses keep heat to inside of glass. Clear glass makes layers visible making latte lattes appealing. Purchased additional glassware. Transaction with seller was smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Bev W

customer_reviews.title: I like these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses. I got all three sizes. They are very stylish. Keeps drink warm. I like seeing the drink I drink. I stopped drinking out of regular coffee cups. Part of experiencing a nice drink is seeing the shade of colours of drink in cup. Very pleased. I wash by hand after each use and store on counter next to my DeLinghi espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carina C. Schuelke

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my espresso set up and I am in love! They are perfect, they have a curved lip so when they get full the shot doesnt spill out when completely full. These are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Taking on water
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses one of the cups has an invisible-to-the-eye opening and has allowed water into the wall between the inside and outside glass. Very disappointing, but I’m still going to use it and try to get it to drain somehow
customer_reviews.author: Seashelle73

customer_reviews.title: Still looks news, even 1.5yrs later
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses for my Nespresso. Admittedly, it isn't used for hot coffee very often anymore, but it is used daily for cold drinks and has gone through hundred's of hot dish washer cycles. Still looks new - even 1.5yrs later - with no cracks/chips. Stylish glasses that get the occasional compliment from guests. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: British Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Great cups for espresso drinks
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these cups a lot! I've been using them with coffee I make with my Breville espresso maker
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these espresso glasses. They are a little delicate so I would advise hand washing. They keep the espresso shot reasonably warm for 5-10 minutes but the cup itself is never hot to the touch with is a big, big plus. They look really good too and I always break them out when I have company. I use them 3-4 times a week and have had them for 4 months and they're still holding up well. Quite the steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A Train

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for capachino or americano
customer_reviews.text: These cups are perfect for a capachino or americano. They look great, and the double walled construction allows you to hold a hot cup of coffee without your hands getting hot. Very easy to clean as well, as I seem to get no staining as opposed to ceramic mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Braedon Giblin

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. However, they are glass and if you drop one on a granite countertop, it will break, as I found out. Being dual walled though, they don't get too hot to hold when filled.
customer_reviews.author: Greystoke

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, nice looking, ZERO durability.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look great and feel great in your hand, but you need to be extremely careful with them. I just bought them, got them in this week, my first time going to use them I set one on the marble tray my espresso machine is on and it shattered. Went ahead and threw out the others because if they break that easily Id rather not go through the hassle of cleaning broken glass every few mornings until they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little Espresso cups
customer_reviews.text: these work great, really do keep your espresso hot longer than a regular cup, but not hot on your hands. Very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Veronique

customer_reviews.title: I use this with my Wolf Espresso Machine and love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fancy glasses ever! Pros: Just beautiful glasses (your coffee appears to float) Holds the temperature because it's double walled Will no condensate because it's double walled Boro glass (so much stronger and no green tint of soda lime) Cons: Just price but you get what you pay for and worth it in my opinion (I've bought 3 sets of 2 now for visitor)!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anfang

customer_reviews.title: Good product, prone to flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep my Nespresso espresso hot, but one of the two doesn't sit flat. Point at which outer glass is blown was not cut or smoothed flat. Since it's really for personal use rather than guests, I didn't bother trying to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: NC mom

customer_reviews.title: Everyone at work fights over these. They're great!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome. They don't sweat when they hold cold drinks, and they don't get hot while holding hot drinks. I bought these for our office at work since we just got a new cappuccino machine in the kitchen area, and everyone fights over them! I will likely buy more for my own home. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking glasses that are very functional.
customer_reviews.text: Classy looking. Very comfortable to hold. Appreciate the double walls, which eliminates wetness on the outside of the glasses. I hand wash mine to extend lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Pbm

customer_reviews.title: Cappuccino glasses
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cups. Problem is the glass on the bottom didn't seal properly. So instead of drinking cappuccino all I can do is stare at the water that got inside the glass and is now trapped. It still works functionally but the water sloshing around is irritating. Kind of ruins the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great in every way except using them to pour an espresso shot into a bigger coffee mug. They always spill a little bit down the side and onto the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them, perfect for my morning espresso. Keeps the coffee hot and my fingers cool. Enough room for my shot and a dash of milk, and they look amazing. Love seeing the crema seperate and layer.
customer_reviews.author: James Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and delicate design
customer_reviews.text: It just feels so incredibly fragile. Very delicate and quite frankly hard to use reliably. I wanted something for day to day use but this wasn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Damato

customer_reviews.title: These are so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for guests. They are amazing. Totally insulated. Can double as a shot glass. Excellent quality. Them seem sturdy and not too delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but first set came broken. Took a chance with replacing instead of refund and very pleased with look. Checking it off to holiday delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri E. Witte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and beauty, but price could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, beautiful and functional. Only downside is price but perhaps that is the trade off for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Broke it while cleaning it for first use right out the box. Very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: DMW

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought all three sizes and they fit nicely on the cup warmer of my DeLonghi coffee machine. I already have a Christmas gift idea for a friend who said he really like the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee cups
customer_reviews.text: Great design, easy to clean, comfortable. Fixed perfectly in my Delonghi espresso machine. Will buy more...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Clearly the best cappuccino cup!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are expensive or cheap- but I do know that we love drinking a morning cappuccino from them. Delicate in shape and relatively light to hold, these cups are a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Micetic

customer_reviews.title: You will love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups. Easy to hold, keeps my coffee hot! We only drink 6oz of coffee made on a moka pot. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin glass
customer_reviews.text: Im kind of worry that the glass is to thin and fragile. Not sure would last enough time, will see. Too much money for glass quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Montes

customer_reviews.title: Look good - but somewhat questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Look great, easy to use/clean. However, a little too plasticky and light. I don't think they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Manevski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and unique presentation
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. Everyone asks me where I got them from when I serve cappuccino in them :-D Double wall gives them modern look and they are comfortable for holding. Loving it and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Velibor Puhalo

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in microwave.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived on time but I was disappointed. They look rather cheap and frail looking. They cannot be put in microwave. Have to transfer my cappuccino to another cup then back. Bought some microwave cups therefor don’t use these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bwag

customer_reviews.title: DeLonghi Espresso Double Wall Thermo Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I received the Espresso Double wall thermo glasses as a gift and they are cute however it does not keep the coffee warm. I tested using another regular espresso cup about same size and put in same amount coffee in both cups and result was same. If you are looking for your coffee staying warm like it says it does... don't spend your money buying them. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy break glasses — even in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t last more than three weeks, put them in dishwasher (per “dishwasher safe” claims) and both were cracked after the fourth wash. Not sure why, I bought these because I’ve had these glasses when I lived in Australia and they were sturdy and great. Not this time round.
customer_reviews.author: Tuss

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these exact glasses before maybe a year ago. These ones are awful. Maybe it’s the lot but when I put it in the dishwasher, the second layer got water in it!! I’ve had the other glasses for a year now and never ever had a problem before that.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Salman

customer_reviews.title: Look great, durable, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect with my Smeg espresso machine! They look great and are easy to clean (I typically toss them in the dishwasher). I’ve been using them for several months now and they still look great. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline W.

customer_reviews.title: cute, easy to clean, good for coffee or shots
customer_reviews.text: survives the dishwasher no problem, would be nice to have in double size though
customer_reviews.author: TaffToff

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my cappuccino nice and hot
customer_reviews.text: I take hot water and fill up the classes with the water one minute before I use them for my morning cappuccino. This gets them nice and warm, then I fill with the espresso and frothed milk. My cappuccino stays nice and hot due to the double walled design.I have not had any problems with breakage or chipping. They seem very well made.Also, the size is great for my espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very thick glass, good quality and easy to clean. I like that I can pick up the shot glass without it being hot to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Durable, easy to clean and double insulated. Great complement to my Delonghi Espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe
